pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Illumination and Fortitude $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(9)Grace$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Mine deep underground or ask an enterprising trader if they possess any.
$(o)Diamonds are the queen of gems, supposedly created when the God of Mines crushed all other gems together into one. Use it to provide protection and amplify your innate abilities.$()
